item.description:
Fellow photogs. I spoke to my soccer team and they are open to having pics taken with the caveat that no really bad tragic photos be posted to the web. A copy of all (final) photos taken will be given to me which I will post to our teams TeamSnap website for players to capture the pics they want for themselves.

If you are interested in doing some sports photography with a group of athletic and intense co-ed players. Come out next Saturday. (I was so bummed to not have a camera today. There were some serious physical action shots?.).

So as to not overwhelm the team I'm going to limit this to 8 NEPN photographers. PLEASE only RSVP if you are 100% you will make it out.

We have 4 more games so if you can't make this one I will post another game after we see how this shoot goes.

Please email or call me with questions.

Thanks, Eileen
item.how_to_find_us: We are in Light Purple (Violet) shirts playing against a team in Light Pink.
item.name: Sat, Jun 21, 2008 12:40 PM - 1:50 PM
